verses.name: Psalms 48:1
verses.text: Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.

verses.name: Psalms 48:2
verses.text: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.

verses.name: Psalms 48:3
verses.text: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.

verses.name: Psalms 48:4
verses.text: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.

verses.name: Psalms 48:5
verses.text: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.

verses.name: Psalms 48:6
verses.text: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
